name: Swapwatch
body:
# Swapwatch

This script was built originally to gather server statistics during periods of high load and swap usage, and email them to a helpdesk.  It is built for cPanel servers.

I re-wrote the script when my employer switched over to using Zendesk, which butchered the original formatting of the emails sent by the script.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
